## Contributor Checklist
<!-- Mark completed items with an "x" -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] My code follows the code style of this project
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation

### Formatting & Linting
- [ ] I ran `npm run format` (frontend formatting)
- [ ] I ran `cargo fmt` (Rust formatting)
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have tested the changes manually

### Versioning (Maintainers Only)
- [ ] I ran `npm run version` or `npm run version:<type>` (if preparing a release)
- [ ] Any dependent changes have been merged and published

## Reviewer Checklist
<!-- For maintainers/reviewers - mark completed items with an "x" -->

### Code Review
- [ ] Code follows project conventions and style guidelines
- [ ] Logic is sound and implementation is appropriate
- [ ] No obvious bugs or issues
- [ ] Comments and documentation are clear and helpful

### Testing & Verification
- [ ] Changes have been tested (manually or automated)
- [ ] No regressions introduced
- [ ] Performance impact is acceptable (if applicable)

### Build & CI
- [ ] All CI checks pass
- [ ] No merge conflicts with base branch
- [ ] Build artifacts are generated correctly (if applicable)
